CustomField.formula: IF(not(isblank(OLY_Investigation__c)) && not(isblank(OLY_Investigation__r.TWD_Complaint__c)), HYPERLINK ("/" & OLY_Investigation__r.TWD_Complaint__c, OLY_Investigation__r.TWD_Complaint__r.Name,"_blank"), IF(not(isblank( OLY_Complaint__c)) && not(isblank(OLY_Complaint__r.CMPL123CME__Related_Inquiry__c)), HYPERLINK ("/" & OLY_Complaint__r.CMPL123CME__Related_Inquiry__c , OLY_Complaint__r.CMPL123CME__Related_Inquiry__r.Name,"_blank"),""))
CustomField.label: Grandparent Record
